Package managers

Class CourseMgr

java.lang.Object
managers.CourseMgr
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityManager
public class CourseMgr
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityManager
Controller class meant to handle course/index object related events

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseMgr

      public CourseMgr() throws FileReadingException
      Constructor
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - thrown when there is an error in reading the persistent data files storing courses information

  • Method Details

    • createCourse

      public Course createCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school, int acadU) throws OutOfRangeException, KeyClashException
      Method to create a new course
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of new course
      courseName - Name of new course
      school - School hosting new course
      acadU - Academic units carried by new course
      Returns:
      new course that has been successfully created
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if academic units are insufficient
      KeyClashException - thrown if courseCode already exists

    • createIndex

      public Index createIndex​(Course course, java.lang.String indexNo, int slotsTotal, java.util.List<LessonDetails>[] timeTable) throws MissingParametersException, OutOfRangeException
      Method to create a new index for a given course
      Parameters:
      course - Course index is to be added to
      indexNo - Index number of new course
      slotsTotal - Total capacity of new course
      timeTable - Time table for lessons in new index
      Returns:
      Successfully created new index
      Throws:
      MissingParametersException - thrown if parameters provided are incomplete
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if slotsTotal is insufficient

    • updateCourse

      public boolean updateCourse​(Course course, java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, School school) throws KeyClashException
      Method to update details regarding existing course
      Parameters:
      course - Course to change details
      courseCode - New course code to change to. Must be unique from other courses
      courseName - New name of course
      school - School hosting the course
      Returns:
      true if change was successful, false if otherwise
      Throws:
      KeyClashException - thrown if course Code already exists

    • updateIndex

      public void updateIndex​(Course course, Index index, java.lang.String indexNo, int slotsTotal) throws OutOfRangeException, KeyClashException
      Update information about an index of a given course
      Parameters:
      course - Course to change details
      index - Index to change details
      indexNo - New index number of index
      slotsTotal - New total capacity of index
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if slotsTotal is insufficient
      KeyClashException - thrown if indexNo clases with another index under the same course

    • getAllCourses

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Course> getAllCourses()
      Method to access all courses in the system
      Returns:
      HashMap containing all courses. Course codes are keys

    • getCourse

      public Course getCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode) throws KeyNotFoundException
      Method to access a specific course in the system
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of the course to be accessed
      Returns:
      Course with matching course code
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if no courses in system match the given course code

    • getCourseIndex

      public Index getCourseIndex​(Course course, java.lang.String indexNo) throws KeyNotFoundException
      Method to access a specific index under a given course
      Parameters:
      course - Course to be checked
      indexNo - Index number of index to be accessed
      Returns:
      Index with given index number
      Throws:
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if no matching index can be found;

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent​(Student student, Index index, Course course) throws MissingParametersException, InvalidInputException
      Method to register a student to a course
      Parameters:
      student - student to be registered
      index - Index to register the student under
      course - Course to register the student under
      Returns:
      true if student is successfully added
      Throws:
      MissingParametersException - thrown if arguments provided are incomplete
      InvalidInputException - thrown if student has already registered for the course, or if the index is full

    • removeStudent

      public Student removeStudent​(Student student, Index index, Course course) throws MissingParametersException, InvalidInputException
      Method to remove a student from a course
      Parameters:
      student - Student to be removed
      index - Index to remove student from
      course - Course to remove student from
      Returns:
      Student removed from waitlist, if any
      Throws:
      MissingParametersException - thrown if arguments provided are incomplete
      InvalidInputException - thrown if student has not registered for the course

    • swopStudents

      public void swopStudents​(Student s1, Student s2, Course course) throws KeyNotFoundException, InvalidInputException
      Method to swop the index of 2 students registered for the same course
      Parameters:
      s1 - first student to be swopped
      s2 - second stuednt to be swopped
      course - Course to swop student indexes
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - thrown if either student has not registered for the course
      KeyNotFoundException

    • enqueueWaitlist

      public void enqueueWaitlist​(Student student, Index index, Course course)
      Method to add a student to an index's waitlist
      Parameters:
      student - Student to add to waitlist
      index - Index to enqueue student under
      course - Course to enqueue student under
